welcomeLine: Welcome to your new partner to help you in your self-care routine

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.subtitle: At Lavish Clusters, we believe that luxury should be effortless.
sections.description: Our mission is to empower beauty lovers with premium, easy-to-use lash kits that bring salon-quality results to your home...

sections.title: Meet Aj,
sections.subtitle: Founder of Lavish Clusters
sections.description: I’m Aj, a 33-year-old beauty enthusiast with a lifelong passion for helping others feel glamorous...
sections.blockquote: Lavish Clusters represents more than just lashes—it’s about empowerment...
